full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RGYAL PO CHEN PO RNAM THOS SRAS LA MCHOD GTOR 'BUL BA'I RIM PA LAG TU BLANG BDE BAR BRJOD PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @018A *, ,(CES RGYAL PO CHEN PO RNAM THOS SRAS LA MCHOD GTOR 'BUL BA'I RIM PA LAG TU BLANG BDE BAR BRJOD PA 'DI NI GNAS BRTAN SDOM BRTZON DAM PA BLO GROS RGYA MTSOS BSKUL BA'I NGOR CHOS SMRA BA DGE 'DUN RGYA MTSO'I DPAL GYIS, ,BU STON THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA'I YIG CHA GZHIR BYAS MED MI RUNG RNAMS KHA BSKANG STE CHOS 'KHOR RGYAL GYI GTZUG LAG KHANG GI BKA' GDAMS PHO BRANG DU NYE BAR SBYAR BA 'DIS KYIS SKYE 'GRO THAMS CAD DBUL PHONGS KYI SDUG BSNGAL LAS THAR PAR GYUR CIG ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
